subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Gavin Grant made two of three free throws with a second left as North Carolina State defeated No. 20 Villanova, 69-68, last night to win the Old Spice Classic championship game in Lake Buena Vista, Fla.
snippet: Gavin Grant made two of three free throws with a second left as North Carolina State defeated No. 20 Villanova, 69-68, last night to win the Old Spice Classic championship game in Lake Buena Vista, Fla.
